headlines.description: Andre Gray had given the Hornets the lead after less than two minutes, but they missed opportunities to stretch the advantage.
headlines.shortLinkText: Late Mitrovic goal saves point for Fulham

headlines.description: Burnley moved off the bottom of the table after their first Premier League win of the season with an emphatic 4-0 victory over Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley thrash Bournemouth; move off bottom

headlines.description: Sergio Aguero marked his 300th appearance for Manchester City with a goal to set them on their way to a 5-0 win at Cardiff City.
headlines.shortLinkText: City thrash Cardiff; Aguero scores in 300th game

headlines.description: Newcastle United earned only their second Premier League point of the season with a 0-0 draw at Crystal Palace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle hold Palace in drab stalemate

headlines.description: Leicester eased the pressure on manager Claude Puel by beating Huddersfield Town 3-1 on Saturday to leave the visitors at the foot of the table.
headlines.shortLinkText: Puel's prospects get boost with Leicester win

headlines.description: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah netted his first league goal since Aug. 25 in a 3-0 win over Southampton to send the Reds top of the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Salah strikes as Liverpool beat Saints to go top

headlines.description: A disappointing Manchester United were held to a 1-1 draw at home to promoted Wolverhampton Wanderers at Old Trafford on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd slump to disappointing Wolves draw

events.name: Tottenham Hotspur at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Harry Kane gave the Londoners the lead from the penalty spot shortly before half time, and substitute Erik Lamela sealed the points.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kane strikes as Spurs return to winning ways
